hotels.title: The Hague Sophisticated Escape within the Royal Quarter
hotels.description: Enjoy sophisticated elegance and charm when you stay at the heritage voco The Hague, an IHG Hotel. Located in a former bank building, this stylish hotel showcases original features such as glistening chandeliers, polished marble and timber floors. World-class international cuisine meets Dutch heritage at the hotel's chic restaurant while sumptuous cocktails await in the sultry bar. Venture out of the hotel to stroll around the adjacent Kneuterdijk Palace.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Indigo The Hague - Palace Noordeinde
hotels.title: Heritage Hague Escape in Iconic Royal Quarter Near Palace Noordeinde
hotels.description: A contemporary blend of modernity, regal elegance and Dutch heritage, the Hotel Indigo The Hague - Palace Noordeinde, an IHG Hotel, is ideally positioned in the heart of the Royal Quarter. Set behind the facade of a former bank, Art Deco stained glass, brass lamps and marble columns pay homage to the hotel's heritage. Step outside to discover the charming, cobbled streets which lead to Palace Noordeinde, stroll the palace gardens or dine at one of the elegant local bistros.
